name: Buttonsnurp
description:
Jump the bunny through loads of tricks and traps. Watch out for blocks, blobs, bees, water, spinners, and everything else.

Suitable for adults and kids aged 3 and up.

If you enjoy the game or have suggestions, drop me a line at hello@bittergam.es

Graphics assets courtesy of Kenney http://kenney.nl

Audio is "Town" by Avgvst
